workflows.name: AI-Powered Lead Qualification System
workflows.description: Analyzes incoming leads, qualifies them with AI, and routes to appropriate sales teams

steps.instructions: Analyze this lead data and provide a qualification score (1-10) and reasoning. Consider company size, budget indicators, urgency signals, and decision-maker level. Format as JSON with fields: score, reasoning, priority_level, recommended_action.
Based on the qualification analysis, create a personalized follow-up message that addresses the prospect's specific pain points and value proposition. Keep it professional but warm.

steps.value: Lead qualified and processed successfully. Score: {{ai_response}}

workflows.name: Smart Content Marketing Pipeline
workflows.description: Monitors trending topics, generates content ideas, creates drafts, and schedules social posts

steps.instructions: Analyze these trending topics and create 3 compelling blog post ideas that align with our SaaS automation platform. For each idea, provide: title, outline, target audience, SEO keywords, and estimated engagement potential.
Take the best blog post idea from the previous analysis and write a complete 800-word blog post. Include engaging introduction, actionable insights, real examples, and strong CTA. Optimize for SEO.
Create 5 social media posts promoting this blog content for LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook. Include relevant hashtags, engaging hooks, and platform-specific formatting.

workflows.name: Customer Support Intelligence Hub
workflows.description: Analyzes support tickets, provides AI solutions, escalates complex issues, and tracks satisfaction

steps.instructions: Analyze this customer support ticket and determine: 1) Issue category (technical, billing, feature request, bug), 2) Urgency level (low, medium, high, critical), 3) Sentiment analysis, 4) Suggested solution or next steps, 5) Whether it requires human escalation.

Create a helpful, empathetic response to the customer that addresses their specific issue. If it's a technical problem, provide step-by-step troubleshooting. If it's a feature request, acknowledge it professionally. Match the customer's tone and communication style.
Based on the ticket analysis, create internal notes for the support team including: customer context, solution approach, escalation recommendations, and follow-up actions needed.

steps.value: Support ticket analyzed and processed with AI assistance. Human review recommended for final approval.

workflows.name: E-commerce Inventory Optimizer
workflows.description: Monitors inventory levels, predicts demand, suggests reorders, and optimizes pricing

steps.instructions: Analyze the inventory data and sales trends. For each low-stock item, provide: 1) Demand forecast for next 30 days, 2) Recommended reorder quantity, 3) Optimal reorder timing, 4) Pricing optimization suggestions, 5) Risk assessment for stockouts.
Create automated purchase orders for the top 5 most critical inventory items. Format as JSON with supplier info, quantities, delivery dates, and budget impact.

workflows.name: Social Media Crisis Response System
workflows.description: Monitors brand mentions, detects sentiment issues, escalates crises, and suggests responses

steps.instructions: Analyze these social media mentions for crisis indicators. Evaluate: 1) Severity of negative sentiment, 2) Potential for viral spread, 3) Credibility of sources, 4) Type of crisis (product, service, PR), 5) Recommended response strategy and urgency level (1-10).

If crisis score is above 6, create an immediate response strategy including: 1) Official statement draft, 2) Social media response templates, 3) Internal communication plan, 4) Stakeholder notification list, 5) Timeline for response execution.

Generate personalized responses to the top 3 most influential negative mentions. Each response should be empathetic, solution-focused, and brand-appropriate. Include specific talking points and de-escalation techniques.

steps.value: Crisis response protocol activated. PR team notified and response strategy prepared.

workflows.name: Personalized Customer Journey Optimizer
workflows.description: Analyzes customer behavior, predicts next actions, and personalizes marketing touchpoints

steps.instructions: Analyze this customer's journey data and create a comprehensive profile including: 1) Current journey stage, 2) Behavioral patterns and preferences, 3) Pain points and barriers, 4) Likelihood to convert/churn, 5) Optimal next touchpoints and messaging.
Design a personalized 7-day engagement sequence for this customer. Include: email subjects and content, product recommendations, content suggestions, optimal send times, and success metrics to track.
Create personalized product recommendations based on their behavior, purchase history, and similar customer profiles. Include reasoning, expected conversion probability, and upsell opportunities.

steps.value: Personalized customer journey optimization complete. Marketing sequences activated and recommendations deployed.
